text: 181 is a number. It comes after 180 and before 182. == In mathematics == * 181 is an odd number. * It is a prime number, which means it can only be divided evenly by 1 and itself. * 181 is a palindromic number, because it reads the same forward and backward. * It is also a twin prime with 179 (two prime numbers that differ by 2). * 181 is a centered square number. == In science == * 181 is the atomic mass of the most common isotope of tantalum (Ta). == Fun fact == * 181 is a prime number that is also palindromic. This makes it part of a special group of numbers known as palindromic primes.
title: 181 (number)
